TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileNotFoundException extends System.IO.IOException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileNotFoundException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 尝试访问磁盘上不存在的文件失败时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to access a file that does not exist on disk fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileNotFoundException` 使用值为0x80070002 的 HRESULT COR_E_FILENOTFOUND。`FileNotFoundException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_FILENOTFOUND which has the value 0x80070002. 如果你的代码没有 权限，则此异常的错误消息可能只包含文件或目录名称，而不是完全限定的路径。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths.

related.span: 在 .NET 中处理和引发异常

span.span: Handling and throwing exceptions in .NET
File and Stream I/O

summary.span: 用可选消息字符串和内部 引用初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with optional message string and inner reference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将其消息字符串设置为系统提供的消息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to a system-supplied message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将 新实例的属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如 "找不到指定的文件。"This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified file." 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。This message takes into account the current system culture.

param.span: 的内容设计为易于理解。

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 有关内部异常的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: Gets the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为当前异常的构造函数提供消息，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果该 属性不为 `null` ，则消息将包括文件名。If the property is not `null`, the message includes the file name. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only.

span.span: File and Stream I/O

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回该异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误消息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 该异常的完全限定名，还可能是错误消息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: The fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包括异常的名称、属性的值 、对内部异常调用 ToString 的结果、属性的值 和调用结果 。The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the property, the result of calling ToString on the inner exception, the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果其中任何一个成员为 null 引用，则其值不包含在返回的字符串中。If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.

span.span: File and Stream I/O
